mapper.select: /** 거래번호 생성 **/ SELECT CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d%H%i%S'), SUBSTR(CONCAT('00000000', F_GET_SEQUENCE('TRANSEQ')),-8))
/** 주문번호 생성 **/ SELECT CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d%H%i%S'), SUBSTR(CONCAT('00000000', F_GET_SEQUENCE('ORDER_NO')),-8))

/** Terminal 조회 **/ SELECT DTL.PAY_MTD_SEQ , MTD.START_DT , MTD.END_DT , DTL.APP_ISS_CD , DTL.TID_MTD , DTL.TERMINAL_NO , DTL.PAY_MTD , DTL.MERCH_NO , DTL.TERMINAL_PWD , DTL.FIELD_KEY , DTL.FIELD_IV FROM TB_PAY_MTD MTD , (SELECT MDD.* , TID.TERMINAL_PWD , TID.FIELD_KEY , TID.FIELD_IV FROM TB_PAY_MTD_DETAIL MDD , TB_MID_INFO TMI , TB_TID_INFO TID WHERE MDD.MERCH_NO = TMI.MERCH_NO AND MDD.TERMINAL_NO = TID.TERMINAL_NO AND MDD.DEL_FLAG = 'N' AND MDD.USE_FLAG = 'Y' AND TID.DEL_FLAG = 'N' AND TID.USE_FLAG = 'Y') DTL WHERE MTD.PAY_MTD_SEQ = DTL.PAY_MTD_SEQ AND MTD.DEL_FLAG = 'N' AND MTD.USE_FLAG = 'Y' AND DTL.DEL_FLAG = 'N' AND DTL.USE_FLAG = 'Y' AND DTL.PAY_MTD_SEQ = #{payMtdSeq} ORDER BY APP_ISS_CD DESC LIMIT 1
